meanings.sent1: The used car was much cheaper than a new one.
meanings.sent2: She bought a used book from the second-hand store.
meanings.sent3: The used toy had a few scratches, but it still worked perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His used laptop was like a trusted companion, always reliable.
meanings.sent5: The used furniture gave the room a cozy, lived-in feel.

meanings.sent1: She was used to waking up early for work.
meanings.sent2: He used to the noise of the city after living there for years.
meanings.sent3: The cat was used to being pampered and spoiled by its owner.
meanings.sent4: Being used to challenges, she tackled the problem with ease.
meanings.sent5: The soldier was used to the harsh conditions of the battlefield.

meanings.sent1: The used batteries were disposed of properly.
meanings.sent2: He used matches to start the campfire.
meanings.sent3: She used all her energy to finish the race.
meanings.sent4: The used fuel powered the rocket into space.
meanings.sent5: The used tools showed signs of hard work and dedication.
